entry.title: Truth be told
entry.summary:
Author: alibris23

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,814Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: The boys had mumbled something hushed to each other once the call ended before abruptly heading off in the direction of Bobby’s office. Less than a minute later they emerged, rushing down the stairs and out the station.“What was that about?” Hen questioned Bobby as he appeared from his office.“Family emergency, they’ll be back shortly,”“Whose family? Buck or Eddies?” Chimney asked from the sofa.“Yes,” Bobby responded, chuckling a little to himself.Or Hen Wilson finally gets a glimpse into the personal life of the two newest 118 recruits.

entry.title: S2 Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,381Chapters: 8/12Kudos: 67

Summary: “I know we haven’t been having that best of luck with partners for you yet, but I think today could really go well Buck.” Bobby says, catching her in between jobs. “Let me guess, I’m meeting him tomorrow whether I like it or not and it’s going to take us less than an hour to realise he’s a misogynist.” “Oh, are we better on Buck’s new work partner again, I bet he doesn’t even last through the first call with her.” Chimney says, Kleenex bottle in hand. “That’s rude Chim, I’ve run the maths and the average is at least two calls, give him that.” Kara responds much to Bobby’s charging. “How about you both give the new guy a chance, he’s fully fresh.” “Wait! Cap you’re giving me a Probie.” TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: Silverspring
entry.summary:
Author: 2mommy_sgoodgirl1

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,248Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Buck and Eddie have been doing everything together. But after the lightning thing, things shifted between them. Or maybe things shifted for Eddie. Or was it that things shifted for Buck. But either way, things did shift. But things aren't always smooth. Not when Buck wants to run after he discovers his feelings. Not when Eddie wants to chase Buck. OrOr nothing. The title says it all. This was inspired by a certain TikTok audio I saw and thought, why not.

entry.title: i see trouble (and i want him to come my way)
entry.summary:
Author: neonweeknds

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,296Chapters: 12/24Kudos: 40

Summary: Buck was riding the high of his first successful solo debut, still nursing the ache of someone who walked away, when he got news that blindsided him—his upcoming solo tour wouldn’t be so solo after all. He’d be sharing the stage with Eddie Diaz, a rising country star with a mysterious past and a sound that was quickly blowing up. At first, Buck hated the idea. The last thing he wanted was to split the spotlight he’d fought so hard for. But then he actually got to know Eddie. The problem? Buck had always blurred the line between friendship and something more—and with Eddie, it was getting harder to tell the difference. or the pop star evan buckley and country singer eddie diaz slow burn angsty friends to lovers au.

entry.title: i'm so afraid you're finding me out
entry.summary:
Author: sayitwithyourhands

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,649Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 65

Summary: “Is this Chim?” Eddie asks, defaulting to a safer enemy. “Is that what this is? You’re here as his messenger?” Buck shakes his head. “I’m here as someone who loves you.” The words hit Eddie’s chest and slide, catching on old scar tissue, on the corners where he’s stacked guilt like bricks, on the jagged edges he’s left sharp on purpose, on the hollow he carved out for penance. a 9x03 coda

entry.title: You know how to ball, I know Aristotle
entry.summary:
Author: Iceprincess96

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,659Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Evan “Buck” Buckley has everything a high school golden boy could want: the quarterback spot, popularity, and the backing of his coach. But when his slipping grades threaten his future, Coach Bobby assigns him a tutor from the theatre program. Suddenly Buck finds himself backstage at rehearsals, where he meets Eddie Diaz — quiet, guarded, and impossibly captivating. What starts as a stupid bet between teammates soon turns into something real. Buck never expected to care, never expected Eddie to matter this much. But when the truth comes out on the night of Eddie’s big performance, Buck risks losing the only person who’s ever seen him for who he truly is. Can he win Eddie back — or has he lost the love of his life before it ever really began?

entry.title: The tessitura of time
entry.summary:
Author: amisguidedpoet

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,579Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 3

Summary: The future always watches. He knew that, even if he didn’t fully understand. What he didn’t know was that in less than twenty-four hours, Eddie would no longer be just “the probie.” That in a few weeks, he would cross barriers Buck hadn’t realized existed within himself and become his best friend. And in a year or two, Eddie would become his entire world. He also didn’t know that the end was already waiting. A shooter, a fraction of a second, and the silence left behind when the love of your life is taken from you. At that moment, Buck had no idea what it would mean to love someone like that and then lose them. If he had, maybe he would have taken a better look at the recruit, followed Bobby faster, said something that could have stopped time. “I never told him I loved him.” The words echoed somewhere between dream and memory. “I should have told him I loved him.” --- Buck uses music to travel back in time and change every moment he missed to show Eddie he loved him.

entry.title: Your Heart’s a Bird Without the Wings to Fly
entry.summary:
Author: catniss_37

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,304Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 9

Summary: "Buck!" Eddies voice rang through the space, abruptly cut off by the deafening sound of crumpling concrete hitting the ground. Eddie stared at the rubble now blocking the way between himself and Buck. "Buck," Eddie whimpered as he dropped to his knees in front of the pile of rubble Buck was buried under.ORIf episode 9x3 actually included the subway collapse from the promo, because I'm so mad about that.Continuing the story using that as a plot point. It will be canon divergent from that point onward in season 9, episode 3.
